title: Kinetics & Thermo Gases
description: Thermodynamics of nonreacting and reacting gas mixtures. Introductory quantum theory, statistical thermodynamics, and gas kinetic theory. Crosslisted with ME 6765.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: AE 3450 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 3322 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
